title: 关于TrMenu的条件表达式
author: 黑糖籽.
txt_content:
插件地址：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-918078-1-1.html
如何在一条动作里面使用多条表达式条件
比如需要100金币与点券才能执行那条动作
试过 "tell: 条件达成.<requirement:%playerpoints_points%>=100><requirement:%vault_eco_balance%>=100>" 无用

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
用图标的优先级判断条件呢
https://arasple.gitbook.io/trmen ... you-xian-ji-tu-biao

replies.author: 黑糖籽.
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Bad_Mark 于 2019-12-11 18:16 编辑 
xmdhs 发表于 2019-12-11 16:57
用图标的优先级判断条件呢
https://arasple.gitbook.io/trmenu/cai-dan-1/button/config#you-xian-ji-tu-bi ...
可以是可以，但我想一条指令判断多条表达式条件达成才会执行

replies.author: 劫゜
replies.txt_content: 试试这条  tell: 条件达成._||_Break<requirement:"%playerpoints_points%" >= "100"><requirement:"%vault_eco_balance%" >= "100">

replies.author: 劫゜
replies.txt_content:
Bad_Mark 发表于 2020-10-1 14:07
很早就解决了，谢谢
收到收到，抱歉低于十个不给发，凑个字数
